page.title: 06Fairford Primary School
page.content: Fairford Primary School has ten buildings,some permanent and some temporary.In this{scattered school there are eight class teachers.The oldest building in the school is the original school building which was opened in{1873.}It is built of local Cotswold stone. At the top of the building is a bell tower where the school bell used to be,it now hangs outside the headmaster's study,and is used daily.There are{250 children}in the school,8 full time teachers,1 welfare assistant,2 visiting teachers for musical instruments,1 remedial teacher,4 cooks,4 lunch time supervisors,1 cleaner and 1 caretaker. The school has 4 Spectrum Computers,4 coloured monitors,a colour television and a video-recorder.The Parents' Associationraise a lot of money to purchase equipment.
